local_intent: Execute a pinch grasp on cloth_edge_A using the precomputed grasp pose, then verify the grasp.
assumptions: Grasp pose grasp_cloth_edge_A has been computed and stored
Gripper is open and positioned near the edge
coherence_with_global: Matches the grasp phase of the global plan: after computing grasp pose and aligning, perform Pick and confirm stability/object in gripper.
